    public static final class XConstraints.XGroup
extends ParsingEntry.CEntry
    The class for representing a group of constraints.

    • Field Detail

      • template

        public final XConstraints.CEntryReifiable template
        The constraint template for the group or meta-constraint slide. It is either a stand-alone constraint template or an element containing a stand-alone constraint template.

      • argss

        public final java.lang.Object[][] argss
        A two-dimensional array representing the sequence of arguments that have to be passed to the template.
